com.github.powerlibraries.io

Interface Out


  • public interface Out
    This class contains a number of useful static methods that help creating OutputStreams and Writers.
    Author:
    Manuel Hegner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ByteOutBuilder bytes()
      This creates an ouput of any kind to a ByteArrayOutputStream.
      static OutBuilder file(java.io.File file)
      This creates an ouput of any kind to a File.
      static OutBuilder file(java.lang.String file)
      This creates an ouput of any kind to a File.
      static OutBuilder stream(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
      This creates an ouput of any kind to an OutputStream.
      static OutBuilder target(Target target)
      This creates an ouput of any kind to a Target.

    • Method Detail

      • file

        static OutBuilder file(java.lang.String file)
        This creates an ouput of any kind to a File. The returned OutBuilder can be used to specifiy which kind of Writer or OutputStream should be created and allows you to specify further how the output chain is build.
        Parameters:
        file - the path to output to
        Returns:
        an OutBuilder used to specify which kind of output should be created

      • file

        static OutBuilder file(java.io.File file)
        This creates an ouput of any kind to a File. The returned OutBuilder can be used to specifiy which kind of Writer or OutputStream should be created and allows you to specify further how the output chain is build.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to output to
        Returns:
        an OutBuilder used to specify which kind of output should be created

      • stream

        static OutBuilder stream(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
        This creates an ouput of any kind to an OutputStream. The returned OutBuilder can be used to specifiy which kind of Writer or OutputStream should be created and allows you to specify further how the output chain is build. Be aware that if you use this method you can only build one Output with the Builder. Otherwise the given stream will be used more than once.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - the OutputStream to output to
        Returns:
        an OutBuilder used to specify which kind of output should be created

      • target

        static OutBuilder target(Target target)
        This creates an ouput of any kind to a Target. The returned OutBuilder can be used to specifiy which kind of Writer or OutputStream should be created and allows you to specify further how the output chain is build. This method can be used with custom implementations of the target interface.
        Parameters:
        target - the target to output to
        Returns:
        an OutBuilder used to specify which kind of output should be created

      • bytes

        static ByteOutBuilder bytes()
        This creates an ouput of any kind to a ByteArrayOutputStream. The returned ByteOutBuilder can be used to specifiy which kind of Writer or OutputStream should be created and allows you to specify further how the output chain is build. The returned ByteOutBuilder returns wrappers instead of the normal OutputStreams and Writers that allow you to directly access the underlying byte array.
        Returns:
        an ByteOutBuilder used to specify which kind of output should be created
